service.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for Examples
service.documentation: This document defines a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace identifier enabling the generation of URNs that are appropriate for use in documentation and in URN-related testing and experimentation.

urn-namespace.documentation: The "example" NID is intended to provide a clean, easily recognizable space for minting examples to be used in documentation and in URN-related testing and experimentation.
